news.title: Armand Hammer and the Alchemist Announce New Album Mercy
news.summary: The Haram collaborators reunite for a new project featuring Earl Sweatshirt, Cleo Reed, Pink Siifu, and others

news.title: Everything But the Girl Announce New Best-Of Album
news.summary: Says Tracey Thorn, “We always liked albums that had a fast side and a slow side, so we thought we’d start with the bangers and wind down with the ballads”

news.title: Spotify Adds Lossless Audio for Premium Users
news.summary: Long derided for poor audio quality, the streaming service will start offering tracks in up to 24-bit and 44.1 kHz FLAC

news.title: Whitney Announce 2026 Tour, Share Video for New Song “Back to the Wind”: Watch
news.summary: Julien Ehrlich and Max Kakacek will bring Small Talk across North America and Europe next year

news.title: Vampire Weekend’s Chris Baio and Fort Romeau Announce Debut C.Y.M. Album, Share New Song: Listen
news.summary: “Life of Mine,” featuring Day Wave, is on the self-titled new album, which is out next month

news.title: Miles Davis’ Catalog Acquired by Reservoir Media
news.summary: The deal arrives in advance of what would have been Davis’ 100th birthday next year

news.title: Jessy Lanza Announces Slapped by My Life EP, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: The project is out soon via Hyperdub
